/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of gray and white, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky dotted with a few clouds. 

The street itself is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a touch of life to the scene.

The sun shines brightly in the background, casting shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees. Despite the bustling cityscape, there's a sense of tranquility that pervades the scene. It's a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, where tradition and modernity coexist.
